title.rendered: Rajshri Ponnappa celebrates her birthday with Smile Foundation children

content.rendered:
Rajshri Ponnappa the South Indian celebrity actress celebrated her birthday on the 16th of February 2018 with kids from a Mission Education centre in Mumbai. The kids welcomed her with a cake and wished her a very happy birthday. Celebrations followed with the cutting and distribution of cake and Rajshri had a fun time interacting with the kids. She is a strong supporter of education for underprivileged kids.

Mission Education is a national level programme of Smile Foundation, which is committed to providing basic education and healthcare to underprivileged children.

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 400,000 children and their families every year, through more than 200 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 950 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
